meanings.definition: A type of adhesive that bonds quickly and strongly.
meanings.sent1: I used superglues to fix my broken toy.
meanings.sent2: The superglues held the pieces together perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The superglues worked like magic on the broken vase.
meanings.sent4: Her friendship acted as superglues, keeping us close.
meanings.sent5: The superglues created an unbreakable bond between the two materials.

meanings.definition: To attach or bond using superglue.
meanings.sent1: He carefully superglues the pieces back together.
meanings.sent2: She superglues the photo onto the scrapbook page.
meanings.sent3: The magician superglues the cards together for his trick.
meanings.sent4: Time superglues memories in our minds forever.
meanings.sent5: The artist superglues the pieces to create a beautiful mosaic.
